mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.care_code AS "careCode", a.manager AS "manager", a.phone AS "phone", a.invitation_code AS "invitationCode", a.by_user_invitation_code AS "byUserInvitationCode", a.advance_open_code_time AS "advanceOpenCodeTime", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info( id, name, care_code, manager, phone, invitation_code, by_user_invitation_code, advance_open_code_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{careCode}, #{manager}, #{phone}, #{invitationCode}, #{byUserInvitationCode}, #{advanceOpenCodeTime}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET name = #{name}, care_code = #{careCode}, manager = #{manager}, phone = #{phone}, invitation_code = #{invitationCode}, by_user_invitation_code = #{byUserInvitationCode}, advance_open_code_time = #{advanceOpenCodeTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
